s2.title: XInclude
s2.p: The XInclude example uses the provided DOM API to parse an XML file while expanding the xi:include elements. It then writes the resulting DOM tree in the expanded form.

s3.title: Running XInclude
s3.p: The XInclude sample converts an input XML file into an expanded output XML file. To run XInclude, enter the following
The following parameters may be set from the command line
s3.source: Usage: XInclude [-h] InputFile OutputFile -h : Prints this help message and exits.
